name: You Are Die
description:
GMTK2022 Entry

Arkzenir - Developer

Kristas - Developer

Zbornak - Artist

DragonDePlatino - Dawnlike Tileset

The chess piece army is trying to stifle the emergent beauty of randomisation, take up your arms and take the fight to them!

(Note: MASSIVE parts of the game is missing, there were supposed to be inventory items that you used when you dodgerolled [Get it? dodgeROLL, you are a d6] We just did not have the time, and we sort of lost a member along the way)

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys

LMB

Space

R
